result.reason: Valid UX enhancement — users accidentally drag connections/folders; a toggle in Settings to disable tree drag&drop prevents this
result.approach: Add a bool setting 'DisableConnectionTreeDragDrop' (default false). In ConnectionTreeDragAndDropHandler, check the setting at the start of HandleEvent_ModelDropped and cancel if disabled. Add a checkbox to the Connections options page to toggle it.

attempts.raw_output:

The drag & drop logic is centralized in `ConnectionTreeDragAndDropHandler.cs`. Implementation would require adding a setting and checking it before allowing drag operations.
